item.title: Intelligent Drones
item.description: Our work got the ‘Best Paper Award - Runner Up’ for BuildSys 2021 https://twitter.com/AcmBuildsys/status/1461397230624071688 Desciption Energy-Aware path planning for Multiple Drones considering global view of energy factors and tradeoff, including intelligent edge sensing.
